Booth smashes down a door.
It's the room where June and April were.
It's empty. The nuns' robes are on the floor.
Sniper and a few of the henchmen hold a battered Padre do on the ground.
Where is he?
In your nightmares.
Sniper looks to Booth, who nods.
Sniper hammers a nail into Padre's hand. Padre grits his teeth against the pain.
You're afraid to get your hands dirty, so you make others carry out your sins.
Sniper raises the hammer again, but Booth stills his hand takes the hammer.
Booth leans over Padre's other hand.
You want to be a martyr? I'm good at making martyrs.
Booth raises the hammer.
Like McLaughlin? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 66.
That's right. In our own way, we can all be like Christ. Too bad for you, you chose the worst way.
He slams another nail into Padre's other hand.
You're so drunk with power, you ordered the hit on your own boss.
This is the boss.
Booth hammers the nails in one by one. Bloody Padre screa
Now for the last time... where are my wife and daughter?
Padre, beaten and bloody, laughs.
Benz puts two in his chest. Padre expires.
A produce truck filled with migrant workers stops on the roadside near an onion field. Workers spill out of the ba and get to work.
The last two out are April and June.
They look up and down the road. It stretches forever with sign of civilization anywhere.
A worker tosses burlap sacks at their feet.
Machete returns.
Machete sees Padre crucified.
Elektra sits in a bench at the rear of the church.
I came back to look for you, and I found him like... this. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 67.
Machete seems oblivious to Elektra. Focused on Padre's lifeless crucified body.
YOUNG MACHETE dropping the sugarcane sword and picking up MACHETE...
Swinging wildly, chopping up the bad guys...
PREACHER DAD's dead body...
Another boy's hand picks up the preacher's collar...
Puts it on... YOUNG PADRE...
YOUNG PADRE watches SWAT team surrounding treehouse...
YOUNG PADRE watches YOUNG MACHETE led away in chains...
YOUNG PADRE enters church...
"The more things change--"
(in Spanish) (in Spanish) "--the more they stay the "--the more they stay the same." same."
That's what my Grandma used to say.
The guards told me that before they beat me.
I'm sorry.
You came to arrest me?
Not me. I'm out. But others will.
Out? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 68.
They don't care about Booth. They just want to wipe you out. You're an embarrassment to the feds. I guess I am, too.
She comes close to him.
You could have killed me.
The day's still young.
I want to help you.
She kisses him once, again. Again.
Help me find Booth.
Elektra weighs it.
First things first, I need a drink.
Elektra and Machete walk in laughing with a bottle of Tequila. She flops down on the couch.
Shit my heel is broke.
Give it here.
It's nice having a man around. It's been a while.
Machete pulls out some tools and fixes her heels.
How long awhile you ask? Well, About two years.
Machete looks up. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 69.

Oh that got your attention? Hmm, Actually you're better than my last boyfriend. He never listened. I don't know why I got so desperate. Don't want to grow old alone I guess. You ever get that feeling you're alone and that you'll never meet that one person...
Machete's POV: He sees Elektra talking, but only hears a monkey like jabbering coming out of her mouth.
Are you listening to me?
Machete takes a drink off the Tequila bottle.
Si.
Give me that bottle.
He hands it to her. She swigs.
So what happens now, when you get him, that's it? It's over?
Elektra hears a noise in the back of the house.
Did you hear that? Stay here.
Elektra runs into the back.
Machete hears a scream from the bedroom. He heads towards
Machete enters. The lights are low.
Elektra grabs him from behind, gropes him.
Oh wow...is that a machete in your pocket or...
You're borracha. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 70.
She pushes him down on the bed and stands over him. She's lingerie.
I'm gonna fuck your brains out old man!
She pushes him back onto the bed.
She tears her clothes off, jumps on him and fucks his bra out.
Guns are loaded. Shotguns racked.
Men with guns run up the stairs.
Elektra's on top; manic, yelling, scratching. The bed fra
Machete sees a SHADOW of a man through the window curtain another...
He tries to push her off him.
She WON'T let him! She's an animal, screeches and yells i SPANISH.
Machete grabs the gun off the night table, just as the HI SQUAD gets there.
He manages to keep Elektra happy as he BLASTS the MASKED HITMEN coming in.
They crash through the windows and doors as he finishes everyone off at once.
Elektra lets out a final scream and collapses on him.
Wow that was...
She notices the carnage.
Oh my god...did I wake the neighbors?
They get up. She pulls the ski mask off a dead gunman. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 71.
This is one of ours. He works for the agency.
Come on!
They grab guns and run out.
Machete and Elektra run outside.
Sniper and his men are waiting for them; guns drawn.
He waves for his men to lower their guns.
Machete you can come quietly and we won't hurt the girl.
Machete contemplates this.
You can trust me. I've brought one of your old friends to vouch for me.
Erhman waves with his BANDAGED hand.
Hola Machete amigo, long time!
Erhman beams a big cheese eating smile.
Machete draws his gun.
Not long enough.
Erhman's smile fades. Machete SHOOTS him in the face.
Machete and Elektra open fire with machine guns and speed in a Volkswagon bug.
Elektra enters. She's slowly surrounded by rough-looking Mexicans. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 72.
My friend and I need a little help.
They see Machete behind her.
It's him.
Machete sharpens blades, makes all kinds of razor-sharp m weaponry in the chop shop, using all kinds of scrap metal
Machete lays down sketches and blueprints. The men and Machete build out a tricked-out arsenal on tricked-out vehicles, like something out of a south of the border Roa Warrior.
Machete sharpens his blade as sparks fly.
Sniper cruises by, hunting for Machete.
The chop shop boys spot Sniper snooping. They bring out a huge blowtorch and carve up his hood.
You punk kids! That's it!
Sniper climbs out of his car, gun in hand.
A steak KNIFE flies in from off screen and skewers his wr
He stumbles back gushing blood,and sees...
Luz; alive and well, a red eye patch on. She's wrapped in white bandages crossing and covering her chest and her ar
She's a mess but a beautiful one, like a female road warr
Band aids on her forehead. The white bandages cover her d skin.
Cabron, I told you it wouldn't end pretty. (to the guys) Bring him inside.
They drag Sniper out of the car and into the chop shop. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 73.
You, I got you, what...
It pays to have friends, Pendejo. They got your ass when you need it.
Back to the moment Luz has passed out in the truck.
Pancho barks; BITES Luz on the ASS and pulls her out of t Taco Truck seconds before it explodes.
Sniper struggles as they drag him toward a circular saw.
No! No!
Looking for someone?
Oh my God... Please... No. Please!
They bring Sniper up to the saw and grind away at him.
Luz and Pancho look on.
News crews gather outside.
Booth walks towards McLaughlin's room, cellphone in hand, trying to reach Sniper. Only gets a gurgling, buzzing sou
Goddamn A T & T. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 74.
Booth enters McLaughlin's hospital room. McLaughlin is dressed in a suit and a girl is brushing his hair while another brightens his cheeks with a little makeup.
Where the fuck have you been?
Taking care of business.
My business is here. Did you see those crews out there? They expect a statement. (noticing Booth's ragged
Jesus, what happened to you?
Nothing. Just had a little talk with a priest.
Well, what am I going to tell `em?
Whatever you tell them, I'm sure it'll be golden. (off McLaughlin's blank
Just feed them the line about standing steadfast in the face of terrorism, continuing the fight. You know it by heart.
McLaughlin looks relieved.
I do. All right. Once this is done, you need to take a vacation. You need some air.
Maybe.
No doubt about it. You're losing your marbles, Booth.
The girl finishes the makeup and hair job, and smiles at McLaughlin. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 75.
It's showtime.

McLaughlin stands and exits, Booth right behind them. As leave, we focus on the TV set in McLaughlin's room, showi the front of the hospital and the news crews outside. Suddenly the ticker shows BREAKING NEWS... SHOOTOUT AT LO

head_text.subj: CHURCH RELATED TO MCLAUGHLIN ASSASSINATION ATTEMPT

text: Yellow police tape around the perimeter.
Torrez watches from a distance, looking around.
Torrez sees Elektra's car drive by. He hops into his rent and follows her.
McLaughlin and Booth exit the hospital to face the throng reporters. McLaughlin approaches a makeshift lectern of microphones.
I'd just like to thank the all of you for your support during this difficult time.
McLaughlin's supporters cheer and hold up pro-McLaughlin, anti-immigration signs.
My will to fight has only just begun. We must not let the terrorists win this battle for our land, our America! Thank you.
More cheers.
One of the reporters steps up.
Congressman, there are reports implicating your advisors as having orchestrated the shooting. Would you care to comment?
The cheers fizzle. McLaughlin looks stunned. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 76.
Do what now?
Webcam footage plays of Booth in the church.
You want to be a martyr? I'm good at making martyrs.
Like McLaughlin?
That's right.
He slams another nail into Padre's other hand.
You're so drunk with power, you ordered the hit on your own boss.
McLaughlin looks to Booth, but Booth is GONE.
No further comment. Thank you.
McLaughlin ducks back inside.
McLaughlin stumbling.
Could somebody fucking help me? I think I'm having a heart attack.
Booth takes hold of him and ushers him out the back door.
Outside McLaughlin's supporters are dazed and confused. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 77.
Booth drives. McLaughlin pops vicodins with a bottle of Maker's Mark.
What did you do, Booth? You jeopardized my career with that wetback! He could have fucking killed me!
Not with that scope.

You stupid sonofabitch. You pull something like this, without consulting me?! You fucked me. You are a stupid sonofabitch. The press is going to demand answers! You got another brilliant solution for that?
They stop.
Suddenly, MACHETE is standing on top of the limo. He's throwing knives into the open sunroof.
McLaughlin is pinned to the seat.
Booth exits the vehicle and hightails it. Machete pursues
Booth and Machete on the run, after each other. Fistfight the street.
Booth scrambles up a fire escape.
A group of men are standing around a pitbull pit where tw pit bulls are going at it.
The men place bets excitedly on which dog will be the vic
Machete and Booth fight on the roof. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 78.
Machete and Booth roll off a roof and tumble into the pit pit, fighting each other as the dogs fight. The men aroun them start placing bets on Machete and Booth.
Booth cuts one of the men and the pitbulls go after him.
Booth escapes from the circle and carjacks a woman.
He kicks her out of the car and speeds towards the Armory
Von! Von!
Machete comes out of the alleyway. His buddies in their R Warrior rides swing by and pick him up.
Follow him.
Von's phone rings. Von sits on a couch watching the news. Booth's mug fills the screen. Von makes no sudden move to answer.
Shouldn't you--?
Let him stew awhile.
Von mutes the TV, answers the phone.
Von here.
Benz drives.
Where are you, goddamnit!? I'm bringing him up.
Up? Up where?
Up your fat, fishbelly ass! RNewman / Endeavor Draft 79.
Fine. Bring him here. Papa Von's got a big surprise a-waiting.
Elektra enters. Place looks deserted again.
Shit. I don't even want to know who she's fucking now.
Sis is being savagely attacked by Torrez.
Elektra hears it, but thinks it's Sis fucking.
Fucking shit, bitch. Make him pay for a goddamn hotel.
Thuds get louder, then stop.
Elektra looks up.
Sis?
Bedroom door opens slowly.
Elektra sees the horror inside. Puts a hand to her mouth staunch the flow of projectile vomit.
Then she's taken from behind by Torrez's henchmen.
She was just a warmup. Now I'm ready for dessert.
He edges in.
Militiamen guard the gate.
Booth barrels towards the gate. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 80.
He spins out and gets out of the car.
Shut the gate quick! He's after me!
Some of the men shut the gate. Booth approaches Von.
He killed McLaughlin. He's coming after me.
And you led him right to Papa Von. That's some kind of thank you.
I saw to it that McLaughlin gave you the keys to this fortress. You owe us.
The senator, maybe. But what exactly do I owe you, turncoat?
What are you talkin--
You held the hand that held the gun, Booth. Just as good as you killed him.
Booth lunges for him but the other militia men hold him b
Put the traitor in the brig.
They lead Booth away, kicking and spitting.
You can't do this to me, Von! You need me!
Booth is secured in the brig.

Booth flings hot coffee in the guard's face, jerks his be and smashes the guy's face into the bars. Snags the keys escapes from the brig. He pulls a few bucks out of his po and flings them down Sonny-style on the prone guard. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 81.
Booth and Von showdown. Booth slaughters Von with an Amer flag through the throat, coming out his spine at the back the neck.
Glory, glory, hallelujah.
ROAD WARRIOR vehicles barrel towards the armory.
They're driving a semitruck --
It crashes through the front gate, then spins as --
The backdoor of the semi trailer rolls up revealing
--as Machete rides it out.
Machete's army of workers stream out from their road warr chop shop rides.
Machete dismounts. His army behind him.
He raises his MACHETE against the sun and his army all ra theirs.
Big battle sequence as they storm the armory. Knives and guns... a ballet of bullets and blood.
LUZ arrives in one of the HOT RODS from the chop shop. Sh has a MACHETE GUN that shoots out Machete blades like a Machine gun.
A minuteman grabs her from behind, but..
He is STABBED in the CALF by Pancho! A METAL HARNESS onhi back holds a sharp KNIFE that he stabs with.
The minuteman falls, Pancho stabs him in the face.
Luz leads a gang of her customers into the battle.

Minutemen and Mexicanos of all walks of life--janitors, gardeners, laborers, gangbangers, etc.--fight it out at t armory. Fighting it out with the implements of their trad knives hidden in mops, a weedwhacker attack, etc. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 82.
A wailing AMBULANCE CRASHES through a gate running down minutemen. DOC FELIX and his sexy NURSE get out and help wounded Mexican. Doc flicks a SCALPEL at an approaching G
Machete unveils a Gatling Gun with a special mount that affixes to the front of the chopper.
Booth scrambles to arm himself, but he's cornered. He tri to take cover behind thugs, but--
Machete on the motorcycle with the Gatling Gun mows down Booth, machine gunning him in half.
Booth looks down at his own white shirt, now stained crim and ripped to shreds as he falls to the ground in TWO PIE
While the battle between chopshoppers and militia rages o
TORREZ appears with ELEKTRA--
Machete!
Machete stops, turns to see Elektra, bound and gagged in Torrez's control.
You never learned to stay down, pendejo. I killed you once. I can do it again.
Machete skids into the warehouse. Fuel barrels line a far wall.
Torrez is ready for him.
All roads lead to Hell, eh, Machete?
Machete squints. Flashes back to the earlier scene. The t images blur into one.
Most people die in the fire, but you survived, you unlucky bastard.
I was born in the fire. It wasn't luck. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 83.
Faith? Yeah, faith got you a good job picking melons. While I bought the world.
What good is it...
.. for a man to gain the whole world yet forfeit his soul? Mark 8:36. I know it better than you Machete. Your father taught it to me, too!
Torrez ATTACKS Machete
The two FIGHT with sword and machete.
Elektra rolls on the ground, dodging Torrez's rain of blo from the samurai swords.
One sweep slices her bindings and she scrambles to safety
The distraction is enough for Machete to gain the upper h and slash Torrez across the front.
On the edge of death Torrez seems to soften.
Machete, we were friends. We stood for something...
Machete impales TORREZ between the eyes.
Blood shoots out his mouth.
I'm still standing...Puta.
Machete pulls out the blade, Torrez falls dead.
EXPLOSIONS and black smoke light up the sky behind Machet
Machete drives his Gun Bike south. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 84.
COP LIGHTS appear behind him.
He pulls over.
The Officer walks up. His flashlight blinds him.
What's the problem officer?
The Officer just stands there, silent, his flashlight blinding in Machete's eyes.
Let me give you my ID.
Machete reaches for his knife: then he sees the cops shoe
RED STILETTOS; It's ELEKTRA.
What's your name?
Machete.
I called in some favors. Look at this. All the right papers; a real identity. You could start over, be a real person.
She puts the green card in his hand. Machete looks at it, then crumbles it and drops it.
Why do I want to be a real person... when I'm already a myth?
Where will you go?
Torrez was just an errand boy. I'm going to find the man who sent the message.
Elektra steps into the headlights. She's dressed in hot C LINGERIE.
I'll ride with you. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 85.
They kiss.
Machete and Elektra drive away on the gun bike.
The cop car abandoned on the side of the road; lights sti flashing.

A family of illegals crossing the border in the desert, s WATER STATION up ahead. They make for it, opening it up a drinking heavily from the water supply. A BULLET brings o of them down and the others scramble for safety but there someone out there, shooting at them.
MOTHER hushes the younger ones.
Say a prayer to El Machete to protect you.
The younger ones start to pray.
A JEEP patrols the area and we see it's MINUTEMEN taking potshots at the illegals.
Did you get `em?
I don't know. They're like brown jackrabbits. Let's see if they'll show their little white tails.
Flicks on a highpowered light by the side mirrors on the JEEP.
The light is on long enough to illuminate a MACHETE BLADE coming straight for them.
Holy shit!
His words gurgle in his throat as his head is severed fro his body. 2nd MINUTEMAN freaks and makes a run for it. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 86.
Stumbles in the dark, in the dust. Scrambles but can't ge his feet as he sees the outline of a DARK FIGURE above hi
Young illegals' prayers continue as the MACHETE comes dow 2nd MINUTEMAN.
Sounds of struggle, slaughter... then silence.
Light a candle... Say a prayer...
Young illegal opens eyes...
There's a glass candle in his hands, but no one else arou Instead of Christ or a Virgin on the candle is a silhouet of MACHETE...
